functions.author: The Coven of Tomes
pages:
§3[Astral Form]§1

Expert mastery of Lunar Magick is not about creating illusions or even creating water/ice. It is about realizing that nothing is truly real, not even the Witch themself, in the illusion of reality.§r

§3Astral Form§1 relies upon this principle to force the Witch into the folds of reality and illusion. Death and obstacles are no longer problems but touch is a sense that loses its meaning in this space.
§1This spell is temporary of course, and is typically used for escaping or spying discreetly on others.
